title: A Peddler
marks: Engraver\'s initials \"CRP Sc\" in plate at lower rig
description: This image and image #G279 are on the same face of p. 503 of Century Magazine for February 1887; Sketch owned by Mrs. Martin Brimmer; Wood engraving possible transferred to metal plate
creditline: Gift of Dr. and Mrs. Robert D. Semsch
